room_title: Escape room "Family Secrets" by Room Escape USA in Richmond (VA)
room_description:
Your parents own a clinical trial business and they pressured your Grandpa Earl into taking a new drug. Following the years after taking the drug Grandpa Earl started to go crazy. He started to have visions he was part of a cult and began sacrificing locals one by one.
In recent weeks, Grandpa Earl began having dreams of what life had been like before taking the drug and now he is out for revenge for all he has missed in life. Handcuffed and locked in a dark room with the temperature rising, you must escape before Grandpa Earl returns with the last sacrifice.
